headline: FAA Says Boeing Must Do More as 737 Max Output Rises to 42 Monthly

headline: Boeing Joins US Minerals Stockpile To Support Long Term Recovery
summary: Boeing is joining a new US public-private initiative to build a stockpile of critical minerals for aerospace manufacturing. The program aims to reduce reliance on Chinese rare earths and support more resilient domestic supply chains. The effort is backed by private capital alongside a large US government loan, highlighting its importance for national security and industrial capacity. Boeing, traded as NYSE:BA, is entering this minerals stockpiling effort as a major industry player with a...

headline: Rare Earth Stocks Rise On Trump $12 Billion Stockpile Report
summary: Rare earth stocks rallied on Monday morning on a report that the Trump administration is set to provide $10 billion in financing for a nearly $12 billion critical minerals stockpile.  Bloomberg reported the initiative known as Project Vault, which includes General Motors, Google and Boeing among more than a dozen early participants.  USA Rare Earth and MP Materials rose.

headline: Boeing: The Growth Is Just Starting
